trends: There have been no other sightings in Bethel
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailslate night after june 23, 1996 or during the 1st week of july 1996 was heading to bed. as i passed through my kitchen area i glanced towards my back yard and saw up in the sky an orange rotating object, going around like a diorama or merry-go-round. it was maybe at an angle of 70-80 degrees above the horizon. i could see that there appeared sectional squares\rectangles that were discernable as it rotated. it was going from left to right across the sky. this would be considered going eastbound going towards monticello, ny. i yelled to my daughter to come and see what i was seeing. she looked, but didn't seem as excited as i was. she did acknowledge that she saw what i was seeing, but didn't really comment. the object quickly flew out of site. i know what i was seeing wasn't a plane.i has previously been stationed at a naval air station in tx. and live in hawaii where i had an unobstructed view of various types of military and commerical planes taking off and landing from honolulu airport and the adjacent hickham afb runways. i observed these planes day and night with military feild binoculars. the light that night were no way those of a helicopter, jet, commerical or military or props.
Summary: disc, orange rotating light along body, moving west to east
